Activity: Check emails and address any urgent feedback from the clinical or data analysis teams.
Meet with @itpm-1 to present the progress on table design and data mapping. Discuss any roadblocks or additional requirements.
Refine the table design based on feedback from the IT Project Manager. Ensure all constraints and relationships are correctly defined.
Complete the mapping of all EHR data elements to the new tables. Validate the mappings with sample data provided by @mrs-1 and @mrs-2.

Prepare test scripts to verify the integrity of the new tables and data mappings.
Document the day's progress and plan for the remaining tasks.
